overview_of_class: An example-oriented survey of nonlinear dynamical systems, including chaos. Combines numerical exploration of differential equations describing physical problems with analytic methods and geometric concepts. Emphasis is on application to mechanical, fluid dynamical, electrical, chemical, and biological systems. Prerequisite: equivalent of ES APPM 311-1,2 or permission of instructor.
name: Applied Dynamical Systems
title: MEAS ES_APPM 322-0-20 Applied Dynamical Systems

descriptions.name: Overview of class

Emphasis is on application to mechanical, fluid dynamical, electrical, chemical, and biological systems. Prerequisite: equivalent of ES APPM 311-1,2 or permission of instructor.
